title: Session 01 — Trouble in Bryn Shander
body:
# Recap

The party arrived in **Bryn Shander** during heavy snow. Rumors mentioned giants harassing the Ten-Towns.

### Key Events
- Met Sheriff *Markham Southwell* and Speaker *Duvessa Shane*.
- A frost giant scouting party searched for *Artus Cimber*.
- Party defended the walls; townsfolk thankful.

### Hooks
- Follow leads on **Artus Cimber**.
- Seek out the wandering giant ally **Harshnag**.

title: Harshnag the Grim (NPC)
body:
A battle-hardened **frost giant** who opposes the Ordning's chaos.

- Favors mortals who stand against monstrous giants.
- Often roams the **Spine of the World**.
- Can guide the party to the **Eye of the All-Father**.

title: Location — Eye of the All-Father
body:
Ancient giant temple hidden in the mountains.

- Houses the oracle of **Annam**.
- Answers questions when proper rites are observed.
- Crucial to understanding the **Ordning** upheaval.

title: House Rule — Critical Hits
body: **Crits:** Roll damage dice twice (`2d`) + modifiers once. Brutal Critical features add extra dice after doubling.

title: Faction — Harpers
body: A semi-secret network promoting equality and opposing tyranny. Potential patrons or quest-givers in the North.

title: SRD 5.1 Attribution
body: Select spell summaries are adapted from the D&D 5.1 System Reference Document, released under Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 by Wizards of the Coast.

title: Acid Splash
body:
# Acid Splash (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Dex save by one or two creatures within 5 ft of each other; a target takes 1d6 acid damage (scales with level).

title: Mage Hand
body:
# Mage Hand (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

Create a spectral hand to manipulate objects (up to 10 lb). Can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 lb.

title: Guidance
body:
# Guidance (Divination cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Touch a willing creature; once before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to one ability check.

title: Prestidigitation
body:
# Prestidigitation (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Up to 1 hour

Perform minor magical effects: clean/soil, flavor, light/snuff a small flame, create a trinket, etc.

title: Shield
body:
# Shield (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when hit or targeted by Magic Missile)
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

An invisible barrier gives +5 AC until start of your next turn; you also take no damage from Magic Missile.

title: Cure Wounds
body:
# Cure Wounds (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

A creature you touch regains 1d8 + your spellcasting modifier HP (more when cast at higher levels).

title: Bless
body:
# Bless (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of holy water)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Up to three creatures gain +1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws (more targets when cast at higher levels).

title: Misty Step
body:
# Misty Step (2nd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Self
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

title: Fireball
body:
# Fireball (3rd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 150 ft
Components: V,S,M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
Duration: Instant

A 20-foot-radius explosion deals 8d6 fire damage (Dex save for half). Damage increases by 1d6 per slot above 3rd.

title: Counterspell
body:
# Counterspell (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when a creature within 60 ft casts a spell)
Range: 60 ft
Components: S
Duration: Instant

Interrupt a creature in the process of casting. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, it fails; otherwise make an ability check.

title: Blade Ward
body:
# Blade Ward (Abjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from weapon attacks until the end of your next turn.

title: Chill Touch
body:
# Chill Touch (Necromancy cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

Ranged spell attack; 1d8 necrotic damage and no healing; target is a ghostly skeletal hand clinging to it until your next turn (undead have disadvantage on attack rolls against you).

title: Dancing Lights
body:
# Dancing Lights (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (phosphorus, wychwood, or glowworm)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Create up to four torch-sized lights that shed dim light; they can move and combine into a glowing humanoid form.

title: Druidcraft
body:
# Druidcraft (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant or up to 1 minute

Whispering to nature produces minor effects: predict weather, create sensory effects, light/snuff a candle, or cause a flower to bloom.

title: Eldritch Blast
body:
# Eldritch Blast (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Make a ranged spell attack for 1d10 force damage. Beams increase with level and can target the same or different creatures.

title: Fire Bolt
body:
# Fire Bolt (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Ranged spell attack; 1d10 fire damage; ignites flammable unattended objects.

title: Friends
body:
# Friends (Enchantment cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: S,M (cosmetics)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

You gain advantage on Charisma checks directed at one non-hostile creature. Afterward, it realizes you used magic and may become hostile.

title: Light
body:
# Light (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,M (firefly or phosphorescent moss)
Duration: 1 hour

Object sheds bright light in a 20‑ft radius (dim light +20 ft). If object is worn/carried, save negates.

title: Mending
body:
# Mending (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (two lodestones)
Duration: Instant

Repairs a break or tear in an object (no larger than 1 foot in any dimension).

title: Message
body:
# Message (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (copper wire)
Duration: 1 round

Point at a creature and whisper a message; it can reply in a whisper only you can hear.

title: Minor Illusion
body:
# Minor Illusion (Illusion cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: S,M (fleece)
Duration: 1 minute

Create a sound or an image of an object (5‑ft cube). Investigation check can reveal the illusion.

title: Poison Spray
body:
# Poison Spray (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Target makes a Con save or takes 1d12 poison damage.

title: Produce Flame
body:
# Produce Flame (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 10 minutes

A flame appears in your hand, shedding bright/dim light. You can hurl it as a ranged spell attack (1d8 fire).

title: Ray of Frost
body:
# Ray of Frost (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Ranged spell attack; 1d8 cold damage and target’s speed is reduced by 10 ft until your next turn.

title: Resistance
body:
# Resistance (Abjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (miniature cloak)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Touch a willing creature; once before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to one saving throw.

title: Sacred Flame
body:
# Sacred Flame (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Target makes a Dex save or takes 1d8 radiant damage; target gains no cover bonus from the save.

title: Shillelagh
body:
# Shillelagh (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (mistletoe, shamrock leaf, club/quaterstaff)
Duration: 1 minute

Imbue a club or quarterstaff; it uses your spellcasting ability for attack/damage and deals 1d8 damage. Weapon becomes magical.

title: Shocking Grasp
body:
# Shocking Grasp (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Melee spell attack; 1d8 lightning damage and target can’t take reactions until the start of its next turn (advantage if target wears metal armor).

title: Spare the Dying
body:
# Spare the Dying (Necromancy cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Stabilize a creature at 0 HP; the target becomes stable.

title: Thaumaturgy
body:
# Thaumaturgy (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: Up to 1 minute

Manifest minor wonders: booming voice, flickering flames, tremors, doors fly open, etc.

title: Thorn Whip
body:
# Thorn Whip (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (plant stem with thorns)
Duration: Instant

Melee spell attack at range; 1d6 piercing damage and pull the creature up to 10 ft closer to you if it’s Large or smaller.

title: True Strike
body:
# True Strike (Divination cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 round

On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target (assuming the spell hasn’t ended).

title: Vicious Mockery
body:
# Vicious Mockery (Enchantment cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Target that can hear you makes a Wis save or takes 1d4 psychic damage and has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn.

title: Alarm
body:
# Alarm (1st-level abjuration, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (a tiny bell and silver wire)
Duration: 8 hours

Set an alarm on an area/object. Choose audible or mental alert when a Tiny+ creature enters.

title: Burning Hands
body:
# Burning Hands (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (15‑ft cone)
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Creatures in a 15‑ft cone make a Dex save or take 3d6 fire (half on save). Ignites unattended flammables.

title: Charm Person
body:
# Charm Person (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 hour

Humanoid makes a Wis save (advantage if you/your allies are fighting it). On a fail, it is charmed by you until the spell ends.

title: Color Spray
body:
# Color Spray (1st-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (15‑ft cone)
Components: V,S,M (tiny pinch of powder or sand colored red, yellow, and blue)
Duration: 1 round

Dazzling colors blind creatures in order of current HP, affecting 6d10 HP of creatures.

title: Comprehend Languages
body:
# Comprehend Languages (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (soot and salt)
Duration: 1 hour

Understand literal meaning of any spoken language you hear and read written text you touch (1 page/min).

title: Detect Magic
body:
# Detect Magic (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Sense magic within 30 ft; you learn the school with an action to see an aura around a visible creature or object.

title: Disguise Self
body:
# Disguise Self (1st-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 hour

Change your appearance (including clothing/armor) within the same body shape. Investigation vs your spell save DC to see through it.

title: Expeditious Retreat
body:
# Expeditious Retreat (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

You can take the Dash action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

title: False Life
body:
# False Life (1st-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (a small amount of alcohol)
Duration: 1 hour

Bolster yourself with a facsimile of life, gaining 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points (more at higher slots).

title: Feather Fall
body:
# Feather Fall (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when you or a creature within 60 ft falls)
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,M (small feather or piece of down)
Duration: 1 minute

Up to five falling creatures’ rate of descent slows to 60 ft/round; they take no fall damage on landing.

title: Fog Cloud
body:
# Fog Cloud (1st-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Create a 20‑ft‑radius sphere of fog; area is heavily obscured. The fog spreads around corners.

title: Goodberry
body:
# Goodberry (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (a sprig of mistletoe)
Duration: Instant

Up to 10 berries appear; each restores 1 HP and provides nourishment for a day when eaten.

title: Grease
body:
# Grease (1st-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (pork rind or butter)
Duration: 1 minute

Slick grease covers a 10‑ft square; creatures entering or starting turn there must succeed on a Dex save or fall prone.

title: Guiding Bolt
body:
# Guiding Bolt (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

Ranged spell attack for 4d6 radiant damage; the next attack roll against the target before your next turn has advantage.

title: Healing Word
body:
# Healing Word (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

A creature of your choice regains 1d4 + your spellcasting modifier HP (more at higher slots).

title: Hellish Rebuke
body:
# Hellish Rebuke (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when you are damaged by a creature within 60 ft)
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

The creature makes a Dex save; it takes 2d10 fire damage (half on save).

title: Heroism
body:
# Heroism (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

A willing creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary HP equal to your spellcasting ability mod each turn.

title: Identify
body:
# Identify (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (pearl worth 100 gp and owl feather)
Duration: Instant

Learn properties and attunement of a magic item, or which spell affects a creature/object.

title: Jump
body:
# Jump (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (grasshopper’s hind leg)
Duration: 1 minute

The creature’s jump distance is tripled.

title: Longstrider
body:
# Longstrider (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (pinch of dirt)
Duration: 1 hour

The target’s speed increases by 10 feet for the duration.

title: Mage Armor
body:
# Mage Armor (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (a piece of cured leather)
Duration: 8 hours

A willing creature not wearing armor has AC = 13 + Dex modifier.

title: Magic Missile
body:
# Magic Missile (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Create three glowing darts of force that automatically hit; each deals 1d4+1 force. More darts at higher slots.

title: Protection from Evil and Good
body:
# Protection from Evil and Good (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (holy water or powdered silver and iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Protects against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead: disadvantage to attack you, can’t charm/frighten/possess you.

title: Purify Food and Drink
body:
# Purify Food and Drink (1st-level transmutation, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

All nonmagical food and drink in a 5‑ft radius sphere centered on a point of your choice is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

title: Sanctuary
body:
# Sanctuary (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (small silver mirror)
Duration: 1 minute

Ward a creature; creatures must make a Wis save to attack it. The warded creature ends the spell if it attacks or casts a spell at an enemy.

title: Shield of Faith
body:
# Shield of Faith (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (small parchment with a bit of holy text)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

A shimmering field appears around a creature of your choice, granting +2 bonus to AC.

title: Silent Image
body:
# Silent Image (1st-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of fleece)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create the image of an object/creature/visible phenomenon no larger than a 15‑ft cube; no sound/smell/temperature.

title: Sleep
body:
# Sleep (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S,M (a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket)
Duration: 1 minute

Sends creatures into a magical slumber affecting 5d8 HP of creatures, starting with the lowest current HP.

title: Speak with Animals
body:
# Speak with Animals (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 10 minutes

You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration.

title: Tenser's Floating Disk
body:
# Tenser's Floating Disk (1st-level conjuration, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of mercury)
Duration: 1 hour

A 3‑ft‑diameter disk of force appears, 3 ft above the ground, that follows you and can carry up to 500 pounds.

title: Thunderwave
body:
# Thunderwave (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (15‑ft cube)
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

A wave of thunderous force sweeps out; Con save or take 2d8 thunder and be pushed 10 ft (half and no push on save).

title: Unseen Servant
body:
# Unseen Servant (1st-level conjuration, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (a piece of string and a bit of wood)
Duration: 1 hour

Create an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks you command (Strength 2, AC 10, 1 HP).

title: Witch Bolt
body:
# Witch Bolt (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (twig from a tree struck by lightning)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Make a ranged spell attack for 1d12 lightning; on subsequent turns, use an action to deal 1d12 lightning automatically while maintaining the link.

title: Detect Evil and Good
body:
# Detect Evil and Good (1st-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 ft of you, as well as any place/object that has been magically consecrated or desecrated.

title: Detect Poison and Disease
body:
# Detect Poison and Disease (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (yew leaf)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 ft; also identify the kind of poison, creature, or disease in each case.

title: Create or Destroy Water
body:
# Create or Destroy Water (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of water or grains of sand)
Duration: Instant

Create up to 10 gallons of clean water or destroy the same amount in an open container; alternatively, create rain in a 30‑ft cube for difficult terrain and extinguishing flames.
